meanings.sent1: She actually finished her homework on time.
meanings.sent2: I actually saw a shooting star last night.
meanings.sent3: He actually thought the moon was made of cheese!
meanings.sent4: The sun actually dances across the sky each day.
meanings.sent5: The storm actually painted the sky with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Used to emphasize a statement or response.
meanings.sent1: Actually, I do want to go to the park.
meanings.sent2: Wow, that's actually a great idea!
meanings.sent3: Actually, I think I'll have dessert first.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a punch in the gut, actually.
meanings.sent5: The news hit me like a ton of bricks, actually.
